name: @depay/web3-mock
description: JavaScript library to mock web3 responses either by emulating web3 wallets or web3 RPC requests.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rollup -c rollup.module.config.js && rollup -c rollup.module.evm.config.js && rollup -c rollup.module.solana.config.js && npx rollup --config rollup.bundle.config.js
